ygData.subject: Re: DOWNLOAD TROUBLE
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried to download the patch on Tuesday night after loading the game on my and the wifes computers, but no luck (and I have cable internet!). So....I just got
ygData.messageBody:
I tried to download the patch on Tuesday night
after loading the game on my and the wifes computers,
but no luck (and I have cable internet!). So....I
just got up a half hour early Wednesday morning (Ugg!
5:00 is sooo dark!) and had no problem, downloaded to
both computers in about 5mins. Worked great on my
computer but not on the wifes. Now I have to buy her a new
Video Card because the one she got with the computer
can't handle the game anymore. This game gets more
expensive everyday!! :)<br><br>Kanjien Cheveyo <Free
Agent><br>22nd season WE Ranger<br><br>Uinan D'Mortuus <Also
Free><br>25th season DE SK<br><br>Server Erollisi Marr
